text.sentence: Your call to Mark Taylor in Houston Legal was forwarded to me for response.
Mark is on vacation in Germany until the end of next week.
Per your voicemail, you has some US market descriptions that you need to have reviewed.
I just left Mark a voicemail on his cell phone, I'm not sure if I will hear from him tonight or not.
If youcould email or fax me the document/information you need reviewed, I will run it by Mark as soon as I hear back from him.
I'm sorry I can't be of more help for the immediate moment, but I will respond as soon as I hear from Mark.
